nodes.bodyText: nit: use putIfAbsent()? Also may be rename method to addIfNotExists() to clarify intent?

nit: Please correct me if I'm wrong. Now that we use notifyServer() as a helper in add(), calling notifyServer() doesn't mean we started processing it? Calling notifyServer() from SCP only means we started processing it, no? My point is log might be a little misleading.
